name: neoRhino IT Solutions
description:
Headquartered in Houston, TX (but with a global reach), neoRhino IT Solutions was founded in 1998 by a team of IT consultants passionate about raising the bar on technology support and service for small to medium-sized businesses. We are a managed IT service provider that was born from tradition, raised by technology, and majored in efficiency.
 
Our IT services include Remote Manged Services and On-Site Support, Network Security, Disaster Recovery, Cloud Services, Office 365, Business Voice Over IP Service (VoIP), HIPAA Compliance Assistance, Cybersecurity Assistance, and more.
 
neoRhino’s core philosophies are built on people, passion, and innovation as our certified IT consultants utilize over 60 years of IT service experience in various industries to optimize your every day technology use. As your Managed Service Provider (MSP), neoRhino’s goal is to be your ally in strengthening your office technology and helping your business grow so you can focus on your core business needs.
 
We manage your technology so you can manage your business.
